actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Authorization for the project for flood protection on the Saginaw River, Mich.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of 1958 to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to implement a construction plan for flood damage reduction on the Tittabawassee River at Midland, Michigan, in lieu of structural flood damage reduction; or combination thereof.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Authorization for the project for flood protection on the Saginaw River, Mich.
